#!/bin/bash
# Risk of Rain 2 Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apt update
apt -y install curl unzip lib32gcc1 ca-certificates xvfb
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam

export WINETRICKS_RUN=mono
export HOME=/mnt/server
export AUTO_UPDATE=1
export SRCDS_APPID=1180760

cd /mnt/server/steam
chown -R root:root /mnt

./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 1180760 validate +quit

## setup 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v /mnt/server/steam/linux32/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## setup 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v /mnt/server/steam/linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so
